name: py-rich

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Rich is a Python library for rich text and beautiful formatting in the
terminal.

dependencies.name: py-commonmark
dependencies.description:
commonmark.py is a pure Python port of jgm's commonmark.js, a Markdown
parser and renderer for the CommonMark specification, using only native
modules.

dependencies.name: py-markdown-it-py
dependencies.description:
Markdown parser, done right. 100% CommonMark support, extensions, syntax
plugins & high speed

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pygments
dependencies.description: Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependent_to.name: py-refgenconf
dependent_to.description: A Python object for standardized reference genome assets.

dependent_to.name: py-rich-click
dependent_to.description:
The intention of rich-click is to provide attractive help output from
click, formatted with rich, with minimal customisation required.

dependent_to.name: nf-core-tools
dependent_to.description: A python package with helper tools for the nf-core community.

dependent_to.name: py-streamlit
dependent_to.description: The fastest way to build data apps in Python.

dependent_to.name: httpie
dependent_to.description: Modern, user-friendly command-line HTTP client for the API era.

dependent_to.name: py-dvc
dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.

dependent_to.name: py-twine
dependent_to.description: Twine is a utility for publishing Python packages on PyPI.

dependent_to.name: drishti
dependent_to.description:
Drishti is a command-line tool to guide end-users in optimizing I/O in
their applications by detecting typical I/O performance pitfalls and
providing a set of recommendations.

dependent_to.name: py-keras
dependent_to.description:
Multi-backend Keras. Keras 3 is a new multi-backend implementation of
the Keras API, with support for TensorFlow, JAX, and PyTorch.

dependent_to.name: py-multiqc
dependent_to.description:
MultiQC is a tool to aggregate bioinformatics results across many
samples into a single report. It is written in Python and contains
modules for a large number of common bioinformatics tools.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-theme-builder
dependent_to.description: A tool for authoring Sphinx themes with a simple (opinionated) workflow.

dependent_to.name: py-memray
dependent_to.description: A memory profiler for Python applications.

dependent_to.name: py-colossalai
dependent_to.description:
An integrated large-scale model training system with efficient
parallelization techniques.

dependent_to.name: py-maestrowf
dependent_to.description:
A general purpose workflow conductor for running multi-step simulation
studies.

dependent_to.name: py-lightning
dependent_to.description:
The Deep Learning framework to train, deploy, and ship AI products
Lightning fast.
